objective: Communicate personal information and understand details about others.
content: Greetings, introductions, age, occupation, and family relationships.
specific_objectives: Introduce self and others in a formal and informal setting
Describe physical characteristics and personality traits
Discuss family members and their roles
State and ask for personal details (age, birthday, nationality)
Express likes, dislikes, and hobbies

objective: Describe daily activities and leisure pursuits.
content: Daily routines, time, weather, and seasonal activities.
specific_objectives: Describe daily routine using reflexive verbs (where applicable)
Tell the time and discuss schedules
Discuss weather conditions and appropriate clothing
Talk about school life (subjects, timetable, rules)
Express opinions about leisure activities and sports

objective: Navigate common shopping and service scenarios.
content: Buying food, clothes, and using services like the post office or bank.
specific_objectives: Request items in a shop or market
Ask for prices and understand currency
Identify various types of shops and their products
Discuss fashion, sizes, and colors
Understand and give simple instructions for services

objective: Communicate effectively while traveling or hosting.
content: Modes of transport, giving directions, and hotel/restaurant interactions.
specific_objectives: Ask for and give directions to local landmarks
Discuss various modes of transport and their pros/cons
Book a hotel room and discuss amenities
Order food and drinks in a restaurant
Discuss travel plans and holiday experiences

objective: Apply correct grammatical structures to enhance communication.
content: Verb tenses (Present, Past, Future), gender/number agreement, and sentence structure.
specific_objectives: Apply correct verb endings for regular and irregular verbs
Use past tenses (Preterite/Imperfect or Passé Composé/Imparfait) to recount events
Formulate questions using various patterns
Apply correct adjective-noun agreement
Use future or near-future tenses to discuss plans
